import locationData from '@/app/data/locationData.json' import seoData from '@/app/data/seoData.json' import { ContactForm } from '@/components/ContactForm' import { notFound } from 'next/navigation' import Link from 'next/link' import { ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react' import type { Metadata } from 'next' // Helper to find location const getLocation = (slug: string) => { return locationData.find(l => l.slug === slug) } // Helper to normalize string to slug const toSlug = (text: string) => { return text.toLowerCase().replace(/[^\w\s-]/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '-').trim() } export async function generateMetadata(props: { params: Promise<{ slug: string }> }): Promise { const params = await props.params const location = getLocation(params.slug) // Try to find exact match in seoData for superior SEO title/description const seoItem = seoData.serviceAreaPages.find(p => toSlug(p.page) === params.slug) || seoData.serviceAreaPages.find(p => p.page.toLowerCase().includes(location?.suburb.toLowerCase() || '')) if (seoItem) { return { title: seoItem.title, description: seoItem.description } } if (!location) return {} return { title: location.h1, description: location.description, } } // Ensure params are correctly awaited in Next.js 15+ compatible way if needed, strict TS might complain about params type. // But current type { params: { slug: string } } is standard. export default async function AreaPage(props: { params: Promise<{ slug: string }> }) { const params = await props.params const location = getLocation(params.slug) if (!location) { notFound() } return (
Back to Areas

{location.h1}

{/* Main Content */}

{location.description}

{location.localContent}

At Global Security Solutions, we understand the specific security challenges faced by residents and businesses in {location.suburb}. Our team of certified technicians provides rapid response and expert installation of:

  • Alarm Systems: Smart detection and 24/7 monitoring compatibility.
  • CCTV Surveillance: HD cameras with remote viewing on your phone.
  • Electric Fencing: COC-certified perimeter protection.
  • Access Control: Secure entry for homes and complexes.

Protect your property in {location.suburb} today. Contact us for a free security assessment.

Why Choose Us in {location.suburb}?

We have a dedicated team servicing the {location.suburb} area, ensuring fast turnaround times for installations and repairs. Our local presence means we understand the specific crime trends in your neighborhood and can advise on the best perimeter protection strategies.

{/* SEO Content Block: Area Specifics */}

Security Services in {location.suburb}

Whether you live in a freestanding home, a complex, or manage a business premises in {location.suburb}, security is a top priority. Criminals often target properties with visible vulnerabilities such as low walls, dark corners, or outdated alarm systems.

Global Security Solutions offers a comprehensive audit of your property. We don't just sell products; we design a layered security solution that fits your lifestyle and budget.

Our Local Services Include:

  • CCTV Camera Installation
  • Wireless Alarm Systems
  • Electric Fencing COC
  • Gate Motor Repairs
  • Intercom Systems
  • Battery Backups
{/* Sidebar */}
) }

messages.message: Using `` could result in slower LCP and higher bandwidth. Consider using `` from `next/image` or a custom image loader to automatically optimize images. This may incur additional usage or cost from your provider. See: https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/no-img-element
Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

fix.text: unknown

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.

fix.text: never

suggestions.desc: Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

import Link from 'next/link' import { Calendar, ArrowRight, User } from 'lucide-react' import { supabase } from '@/utils/supabase/client' import Image from "next/image"; import { Metadata } from 'next'; export const metadata: Metadata = { title: 'Security Blog | Global Security Solutions', description: 'Read the latest news and tips on home and business security in Cape Town.', } export const revalidate = 60 interface BlogPost { id: string slug: string title: string created_at: string excerpt: string | null featured_image: string | null author: string | null } export default async function BlogIndexPage() { // 1. Fetch from Supabase const { data: dbPosts } = await supabase .from('posts') .select('*') .order('created_at', { ascending: false }) // 2. Format DB posts to match schema const formattedDbPosts: BlogPost[] = (dbPosts || []).map((p: any) => ({ id: p.id, slug: p.slug, title: p.title, created_at: p.created_at, excerpt: p.excerpt, featured_image: p.cover_image_url || null, author: p.author })) const posts = formattedDbPosts return (
{/* Header */}

Security Insights & News

Expert advice, industry updates, and tips to keep your property safe.

{posts.length === 0 && (

No articles available at the moment. Check back soon!

)}
{posts.map((post: BlogPost, i: number) => ( {/* Dog Ear Accent on top of image? Maybe just a corner badge */}
News
{post.featured_image ? ( ) : (
No Image
)}
{new Date(post.created_at).toLocaleDateString('en-ZA', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })} {post.author || 'Admin'}

{post.title}

{post.excerpt || 'Read the full article for more insights on security solutions.'}

Read Article
))}
) }

Why Cape Town Chooses Global Security Solutions.

import Image from 'next/image' import Link from 'next/link' import { ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react' import seoData from '../data/seoData.json' const toSlug = (text: string) => { return text .toLowerCase() .replace(/[^\w\s-]/g, '') .replace(/\s+/g, '-') .trim() } const getSectorIcon = (sector: string) => { switch (sector) { case 'Residential Security': return case 'Commercial & Industrial': return
case 'HOA & Estates': return case 'Farms & Agricultural': return case 'Schools & Education': return case 'Retail & Shopping Malls': // Reuse Commercial for Retail if no specific retail icon return default: return } } export const metadata = { title: 'Security Sectors | Global Security Solutions', description: 'Specialized security solutions for residential, commercial, industrial, agricultural, and estate sectors in Cape Town.', } export default function SectorsPage() { const sectors = [ "Residential Security", "Commercial & Industrial", "HOA & Estates", "Farms & Agricultural", "Schools & Education", "Retail & Shopping Malls" ] return (

Sectors We Serve

Tailored security strategies for every environment, from private homes to large-scale industrial operations.

{sectors.map((sector, index) => { const slug = toSlug(sector) // Find matching SEO data for description const seoItem = seoData.sectorSolutions.find(item => item.page === sector || item.title.includes(sector) || (sector.includes('Commercial') && item.page.includes('Commercial')) || (sector.includes('Farms') && item.page.includes('Farm')) || (sector.includes('Estates') && item.page.includes('Estate')) || (sector.includes('Schools') && item.page.includes('Schools')) ) return ( {/* Blue Dog Ear */}
{getSectorIcon(sector)}

{sector}

{seoItem ? seoItem.description.substring(0, 100) + '...' : 'Specialized protection for this sector.'}

View Solutions
) })}
{/* SEO Content Block */}

Tailored Security for Every Environment

Security is not a "one size fits all" solution. The needs of a residential estate differ vastly from those of a high-risk industrial warehouse or a retail store. That's why Global Security Solutions approaches every project with a fresh perspective, conducting a thorough risk assessment based on your specific sector's unique vulnerabilities.

Residential Risks

Focus on perimeter early warning (beams/fencing) and family safety (panic buttons/safe zones).

Commercial Risks

Focus on access control, staff attendance tracking, and high-definition surveillance for liability protection.

) }

import seoData from '@/app/data/seoData.json' import { ContactForm } from '@/components/ContactForm' import { notFound } from 'next/navigation' import Link from 'next/link' import Image from 'next/image' import { ArrowLeft, CheckCircle2 } from 'lucide-react' import { Breadcrumbs } from '@/components/Breadcrumbs' import type { Metadata } from 'next' // Helper to normalize string to slug const toSlug = (text: string) => { return text .toLowerCase() .replace(/[^\w\s-]/g, '') // Remove special chars .replace(/\s+/g, '-') // Replace spaces with - .trim() } // Find service by slug const getService = (slug: string) => { return seoData.primaryServicePages.find(s => toSlug(s.page) === slug) || seoData.sectorSolutions.find(s => toSlug(s.page) === slug) } export async function generateMetadata(props: { params: Promise<{ slug: string }> }): Promise { const params = await props.params const service = getService(params.slug) if (!service) return {} return { title: service.title, description: service.description, } } export default async function ServicePage(props: { params: Promise<{ slug: string }> }) { const params = await props.params const service = getService(params.slug) if (!service) { notFound() } // Generate generic content based on the service title and description for now. // In a real app we'd likely have more specific content or MDX. return (
{/* Main Content */}
{/* @ts-ignore */} {service.iconPath && (
)}

{service.page} Cape Town

{/* @ts-ignore */} {service.longDescription || `Professional ${service.page} installations and repairs in the Western Cape.`}

{/* The Problem */}

Are you concerned about your security?

Without a proper {service.page}, your property leaves gaps that criminals can exploit. Whether it's unmonitored blind spots, easy access points, or outdated hardware, these vulnerabilities put your family or business at risk.

{/* The Solution */}

The Solution: Global Security Solutions

We install high-performance {service.page} designed for the unique challenges of Cape Town. Our systems act as a proactive deterrent, ensuring that threats are detected and stopped before they cause harm.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Remote Mobile Control: Manage your {service.page.toLowerCase()} directly from your smartphone, anywhere in the world.
  • Proactive Alerts: Instant notifications sent to you and our control room if any breach is detected.
  • Load Shedding Backup: Our systems are linked to battery backups to stay online during power cuts.
  • Certified Installation: Fully compliant with insurance and safety regulations in South Africa.
{/* SEO Content Block: FAQ */}

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does installation take?

Most residential installations are completed within 1-2 days. Larger commercial projects may take longer depending on complexity.

Do you offer warranties?

Yes, we provide a 1-year workmanship guarantee and full manufacturer warranties on all hardware (Hikvision, IDS, Paradox, etc.).

Can I view my cameras on my phone?

Absolutely. All our modern CCTV and alarm systems can be linked to a mobile app for remote viewing and control.

Brands We Use

We don't cut corners on hardware. For {service.page}, we trust only the industry leaders like Hikvision, IDS, Paradox, and Nemtek to ensure reliability when you need it most.

{/* Sidebar */}
) }
